H0.text: How many hundredweight are in a UK ton. 15

H1.text: How many hundredweight are in a UK ton. 18

H2.text: How many hundredweight are in a UK ton. 22

H3.text: How many hundredweight are in a UK ton. 20

A4.text: A long ton is 20 long hundredweight (cwt), each of which is 8 stone (1 stone = 14 pounds).
